title: Holistic Health the New Medicine
brief_description: Mind/body relationships is the theme of many of the holistic doctors. Others stress a better relationship between traditional and Western methods. All stress treating the whole person - body, mind, and spirit. This film shows doctors, leaders in the field, at work and demonstrates their methods for controlling pain, healing cancer, and promoting optimum health.
